name: terraform-outputs
description: This task reads the output values of a Terraform execution and sets them as Azure Pipelines variables
author: Raul Arrieta

inputs.name: workingDirectory
inputs.label: Path to Terraform scripts
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path to the folder which contains the .tf files.

inputs.name: pathToTerraform
inputs.label: Path to Terraform
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path to the terraform file (leave empty if it is globally available).

inputs.name: failOnStderr
inputs.label: Fail on Standard Error
inputs.helpMarkDown: If this is true, this task will fail if any errors are written to the StandardError stream.
